children.value: The standard example is, of course,

children.html: R\RealR

children.value: , the set of real numbers. One can obtain other Polish spaces using the following basic observations. (We leave the proof as an exercise.)
A closed subset of a Polish space is Polish.
The product of a countable (in particular, finite) sequence of Polish spaces is Polish.
Any topological space homeomorphic to a Polish space is Polish.
